scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.FHIR_INIT_ADMIN
scopes.description: Scope required to initialize/format a FHIR Server. All the tables/content will be formatted.

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.FHIR_CONTENT_ADMIN
scopes.description: Scope required to add/modify a FHIR Server Content.

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.FHIR_SCENARIO_ADMIN
scopes.description: Scope required to create/read/update/delete a scneario.

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.FHIR_COMPLETE_PATIENT_DELETE_ADMIN
scopes.description: Scope required to read complete patient data.

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.FHIR_COMPLETE_PATIENT_READ_ADMIN
scopes.description: Scope required to delete complete patient data.

attributes.name: endpoint
attributes.description: FHIR End-Point name which admin has access for configurations

attributes.name: groupId
attributes.description: Value of the groupId attribute that is specified in the Permission Respuece. This grants access to FHIR Resources

attributes.name: identifierSystem
attributes.description: A System that enabled an identifier to be refered from

role-templates.name: fhir_UAA
role-templates.description: These are scopes required for UAA API's.

role-templates.name: fhir_InitAdministration
role-templates.description: This is required to create role that can do the Initialization of FHIR Server as an Administrator

role-templates.name: fhir_ContentAdministration
role-templates.description: This is required to create role that can upload and verify Content deployment on FHIR Server as an Administrator

role-templates.name: fhir_ScenarioAdministration
role-templates.description: This is required to create role that can create/read/update/modify FHIR Server Scenario as an Administrator

role-templates.name: fhir_CompletePatientDataDeletion
role-templates.description: This is required to create role that can read complete patient data

role-templates.name: fhir_CompletePatientDataReporting
role-templates.description: This is required to create role that can delete complete patient data

role-templates.name: fhir_Authorization
role-templates.description: This is required to create role that can help end-users access FHIR API's
